title: Coronavirus update: US death toll soars past Italy's, Swedish PM admits response 'not good enough'
description: The number of COVID-19-related deaths soars past 20,000 in the US, making it the highest death toll in the world. Spain, however, sees its lowest toll in 19 days. Meanwhile, Boris Johnson is said to be making "very good progress" as he recovers from the virus.
content:
Updated 
April 12, 2020 05:32:18
The US has now overtaken Italy with the most COVID-19 related deaths in the world. 
With roughly 2,000 deaths a day for the past four days, the US total toll has passed 20,000. 
Spain, however, is rejoicing after recording… [+8533 chars]
